title: Changes in family dynamics in Great Britain, Japan

content.question: Which of the following was a major factor that contributed to changes in family dynamics in both Great Britain and Japan during the late nineteenth and early twentieth centuries?

choices.label: The migration of male indentured laborers to the Americas
The increased number of women in the workforce
The rapid rise in the number of children working in large factories
The large number of women elected to political office

content.answer: The increased number of women in the workforce

topic.text: 9.5: Calls for Reform and Responses after 1900

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
